00028 #include <stdlib.h> /* for atoi() */
00029 #include <string.h> /* for strcmp() */
00030 #include <stdio.h>  /* for snprintf() */
00031 
00032 #include <openvas/misc/system.h>     /* for emalloc */

00034 #include "pluginscheduler.h"
00035 #include "plugs_req.h"

00037 /**********************************************************
00038 
00039        Private Functions
00040 
00041 ***********************************************************/
00042 
00043 extern int kb_get_port_state_proto (kb_t, struct arglist *, int, char *);
00044 
00050 static int
00051 get_closed_ports (kb_t kb, struct arglist *ports,
00052                   struct arglist *preferences)
00053 {
00054   if (ports == NULL)
00055     return -1;
00056 
00057   while (ports->next != NULL)
00058     {
00059       int iport = atoi (ports->name);
00060       if (iport != 0)
00061         {
00062           if (kb_get_port_state_proto (kb, preferences, iport, "tcp") != 0)
00063             return iport;
00064         }
00065       else
00066         {
00067           if (kb_item_get_int (kb, ports->name) > 0)
00068             return 1;           /* should be the actual value indeed ! */
00069         }
00070       ports = ports->next;
00071     }
00072   return 0;                     /* found nothing */
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00079 static int
00080 get_closed_udp_ports (kb_t kb, struct arglist *ports,
00081                       struct arglist *preferences)
00082 {
00083   if (ports == NULL)
00084     return -1;
00085 
00086   while (ports->next != NULL)
00087     {
00088       int iport = atoi (ports->name);
00089       if (iport > 0 && kb_get_port_state_proto (kb, preferences, iport, "udp"))
00090         return iport;
00091       ports = ports->next;
00092     }
00093   return 0;                     /* found nothing */
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00100 static char *
00101 key_missing (kb_t kb, struct arglist *keys)
00102 {
00103   if (kb == NULL || keys == NULL)
00104     return NULL;
00105   else
00106     {
00107       while (keys->next != NULL)
00108         {
00109           if (kb_item_get_single (kb, keys->name, 0) == NULL)
00110             return keys->name;
00111           else
00112             keys = keys->next;
00113         }
00114     }
00115   return NULL;
00116 }
00117 
00121 static char *
00122 key_present (kb_t kb, struct arglist *keys)
00123 {
00124   if (kb == NULL || keys == NULL)
00125     return NULL;
00126   else
00127     {
00128       while (keys->next != NULL)
00129         {
00130           if (kb_item_get_single (kb, keys->name, 0) != NULL)
00131             return keys->name;
00132           else
00133             keys = keys->next;
00134         }
00135     }
00136   return NULL;
00137 }

00145 
00150 struct arglist *
00151 requirements_common_ports (struct scheduler_plugin *plugin1,
00152                            struct scheduler_plugin *plugin2)
00153 {
00154   struct arglist *ret = NULL;
00155   struct arglist *req1;
00156   struct arglist *req2;
00157 
00158   if (!plugin1 || !plugin2)
00159     return 0;
00160 
00161   req1 = plugin1->required_ports;
00162   if (req1 == NULL)
00163     return 0;
00164 
00165   req2 = plugin2->required_ports;
00166   if (req2 == NULL)
00167     return 0;
00168 
00169   while (req1->next != NULL)
00170     {
00171       struct arglist *r = req2;
00172       if (r != NULL)
00173         while (r->next != NULL)
00174           {
00175             if (req1->type == r->type)
00176               {
00177                 if (r->name && req1->name && !strcmp (r->name, req1->name))
00178                   {
00179                     if (!ret)
00180                       ret = emalloc (sizeof (struct arglist));
00181                     arg_add_value (ret, r->name, ARG_INT, 0, (void *) 1);
00182                   }
00183               }
00184             r = r->next;
00185           }
00186       req1 = req1->next;
00187     }
00188   return ret;
00189 }
00190 
00201 int
00202 mandatory_requirements_met (kb_t kb,
00203                             struct scheduler_plugin *plugin)
00204 {
00205   if (key_missing (kb, plugin->mandatory_keys))
00206     return 0;
00207 
00208   return 1;
00209 }
00210 
00216 char *
00217 requirements_plugin (kb_t kb, struct scheduler_plugin *plugin,
00218                      struct arglist *preferences)
00219 {
00220   static char error[64];
00221   char *missing;
00222   char *present;
00223   struct arglist *tcp, *udp, *rkeys, *ekeys;
00224   char *opti = arg_get_value (preferences, "optimization_level");
00225 
00226   /*
00227    * Check wether the good ports are open
00228    */
00229   error[sizeof (error) - 1] = '\0';
00230   tcp = plugin->required_ports;
00231   if (tcp != NULL && (get_closed_ports (kb, tcp, preferences)) == 0)
00232     {
00233       strncpy (error, "none of the required tcp ports are open",
00234                sizeof (error) - 1);
00235       return error;
00236     }
00237 
00238   udp = plugin->required_udp_ports;
00239   if (udp != NULL && (get_closed_udp_ports (kb, udp, preferences)) == 0)
00240     {
00241       strncpy (error, "none of the required udp ports are open",
00242                sizeof (error) - 1);
00243       return error;
00244     }
00245 
00246   if (opti != NULL && (strcmp (opti, "open_ports") == 0 || atoi (opti) == 1))
00247     return NULL;
00248 
00249   /*
00250    * Check wether a key we wanted is missing
00251    */
00252   rkeys = plugin->required_keys;
00253   if ((missing = key_missing (kb, rkeys)))
00254     {
00255       snprintf (error, sizeof (error), "because the key %s is missing",
00256                 missing);
00257       return error;
00258     }
00259 
00260   if (opti != NULL && (strcmp (opti, "required_keys") == 0 || atoi (opti) == 2))
00261     return NULL;
00262 
00263   /*
00264    * Check wether a key we do not want is present
00265    */
00266   ekeys = plugin->excluded_keys;
00267   if ((present = key_present (kb, ekeys)))
00268     {
00269       snprintf (error, sizeof (error), "because the key %s is present",
00270                 present);
00271       return error;
00272     }
00273   return NULL;
00274 }
